How To Use

Using the Coverage Checker

Follow these simple steps to get your results

1

Enter Your ZIP Code

Type in your 5-digit ZIP code to check coverage in your area.

2

View Coverage Rating

See your area's coverage quality - Excellent, Good, or Fair based on AT&T network data.

3

Check 5G Availability

Find out if 5G service is available in your area and what type of 5G network.

4

Make Your Decision

Use your coverage results to confidently switch to Vouch Mobile.

Why This Matters

Why Check Coverage Before Switching?

Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's nationwide network, providing coverage to 99% of Americans. However, coverage quality varies by location. Urban areas typically have excellent 5G coverage, while rural areas may have strong LTE. Checking coverage ensures you'll have the service quality you expect before making the switch.

  • Vouch uses AT&T's network - same towers as AT&T customers
  • 5G Ultra Wideband available in major metropolitan areas
  • 5G/LTE coverage reaches 99% of the US population
  • Rural areas may have LTE-only coverage with excellent reliability

FAQ

Frequently Asked Questions

Common questions about the Coverage Checker

Our coverage data is based on AT&T's network coverage maps. Actual coverage may vary based on terrain, buildings, and other factors. For the most accurate assessment, consider your typical usage locations.

5G Ultra (also called 5G+) uses high-band millimeter wave spectrum for extremely fast speeds up to 1+ Gbps. Regular 5G uses mid-band or low-band spectrum with speeds of 100-400 Mbps. Both are significantly faster than LTE.

Yes! Vouch Mobile uses AT&T's full network including all cell towers and 5G infrastructure. You'll have the same coverage footprint as AT&T postpaid customers.

Fair coverage means you'll have reliable service for calls and texts, with data speeds that may be slower in some spots. Many customers in fair coverage areas still have great experiences, especially for everyday use.

Vouch Mobile focuses on providing excellent domestic coverage. International roaming options may be available for travel. Check our plans page for current international features.
